TCName.name: SalesHistoryFirstMonth
TCName.SalesHistory: select K.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR from (select J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by k.zone_no order by zone_no
TCName.SalesHistoryTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.ACTL_SLS_MPR),0),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select K.rgn_no,K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR from (select J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no order by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.SalesHistoryTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.ACTL_SLS_MPR),0),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select K.rgn_no,K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR from (select J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no order by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.SalesHistoryTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.ACTL_SLS_MPR),0),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select K.rgn_no,K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR from (select J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no order by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: WagesHistoryFirsthMonth
TCName.WagesHistory: select x.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR from (select V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a. loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no order by x.zone_no
TCName.WagesHistoryTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.ACTL_WAGE_MPR),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no, b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: WagesHistorySecondMonth
TCName.WagesHistory: select x.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR from (select V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a. loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no order by x.zone_no
TCName.WagesHistoryTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.ACTL_WAGE_MPR),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no, b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: WagesHistoryThirdMonth

TCName.WagesHistoryTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.ACTL_WAGE_MPR),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no, b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: WagesHistoryFourthMonth
TCName.WagesHistory: select x.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR from (select V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a. loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no order by x.zone_no
TCName.WagesHistoryTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.ACTL_WAGE_MPR),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no, b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: ItemsHistoryFirsthMonth
TCName.ItemsHistory: select K.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_ITM_MPZ),0),0) as ACTL_ITM_MPR from (select J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_ITEMS from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_ITEM) as ACTL_ITEMS from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEM from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by k.zone_no order by zone_no
TCName.ItemsHistoryTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.ACTL_ITM_MPR),0),0) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR from (select K.rgn_no,K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_ITM_MPZ),0) as ACTL_ITM_MPR from (select J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_ITEMS from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_ITEM) as ACTL_ITEMS from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEM from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) J group by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no order by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: ItemsHistorySecondMonth

TCName.name: ItemsHistoryThirdMonth
TCName.ItemsHistory: select K.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_ITM_MPZ),0),0) as ACTL_ITM_MPR from (select J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_ITEMS from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_ITEM) as ACTL_ITEMS from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEM from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by k.zone_no order by zone_no
TCName.ItemsHistoryTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.ACTL_ITM_MPR),0),0) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR from (select K.rgn_no,K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_ITM_MPZ),0) as ACTL_ITM_MPR from (select J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_ITEMS from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_ITEM) as ACTL_ITEMS from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEM from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) J group by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no order by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.CustomerHistoryTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.ACTL_CUST_MPR),0),0) as ACTL_CUST_TOT_MPR from (select K.rgn_no,K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_CUST_MPZ),0) as ACTL_CUST_MPR from (select J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_CUST_MPG) as ACTL_CUST_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_CUSTS,0) as ACTL_CUST_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_CUSTS from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_CUST) as ACTL_CUSTS from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm, b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_cust_cnt) as ACTL_CUST from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no IN (90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no order by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: PaidHoursHistoryFirsthMonth
TCName.PaidHoursHistory: select x.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND(((sum(x.ACTL_HRS_MPZ)*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as ACTL_HRS_MPR from (select V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no, T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR, sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no order by x.zone_no
TCName.PaidHoursHistoryTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(SUM(ROUND(((ROUND(((L.ACTL_HRS_MPR*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2)),0) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_HRS_MPZ) as ACTL_HRS_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no, V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no, zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: PaidHoursHistorySecondMonth
TCName.PaidHoursHistory: select x.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND(((sum(x.ACTL_HRS_MPZ)*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as ACTL_HRS_MPR from (select V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no, T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR, sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no order by x.zone_no
TCName.PaidHoursHistoryTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(SUM(ROUND(((ROUND(((L.ACTL_HRS_MPR*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2)),0) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_HRS_MPZ) as ACTL_HRS_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no, V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no, zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: PaidHoursHistoryThirdMonth
TCName.PaidHoursHistory: select x.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND(((sum(x.ACTL_HRS_MPZ)*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as ACTL_HRS_MPR from (select V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no, T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR, sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no order by x.zone_no
TCName.PaidHoursHistoryTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(SUM(ROUND(((ROUND(((L.ACTL_HRS_MPR*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2)),0) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_HRS_MPZ) as ACTL_HRS_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no, V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no, zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: PaidHoursHistoryFourthMonth
TCName.PaidHoursHistory: select x.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND(((sum(x.ACTL_HRS_MPZ)*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as ACTL_HRS_MPR from (select V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no, T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR, sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no order by x.zone_no
TCName.PaidHoursHistoryTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(SUM(ROUND(((ROUND(((L.ACTL_HRS_MPR*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2)),0) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_HRS_MPZ) as ACTL_HRS_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no, V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no, zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: CPHFirsthMonth
TCName.CPHHistory: select x.zone_no, case when NVL(x.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPZ,0)=0 and NVL(x.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPZ,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPZ,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPZ,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((x.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPZ / x.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPZ),2) end as ACTL_CPH_MPR from (select W.zone_no,sum(w.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPZ,sum (w.ACTL_HRS_MPZ) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPZ from (select V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no, loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a. dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d. perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) V group by V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.ar_no,V.ar_no) W group by W.zone_no order by W.zone_no) x order by x.zone_no
TCName.CPHHistoryTotal: select M.rgn_no, case when NVL(M.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(M.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(M.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(M.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((M.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR / M.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR),2) end as ACTL_CPH_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,sum(L.ACTL_WAGE_MPR) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,sum (L.ACTL_HRS_MPR) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR,sum(x.ACTL_HRS_MPZ) as ACTL_HRS_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL (U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) M order by M.rgn_no

TCName.name: CPHHistorySecondMonth

TCName.CPHHistoryTotal: select M.rgn_no, case when NVL(M.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(M.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(M.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(M.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((M.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR / M.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR),2) end as ACTL_CPH_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,sum(L.ACTL_WAGE_MPR) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,sum (L.ACTL_HRS_MPR) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR,sum(x.ACTL_HRS_MPZ) as ACTL_HRS_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL (U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) M order by M.rgn_no

TCName.CPHHistoryTotal: select M.rgn_no, case when NVL(M.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(M.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(M.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(M.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((M.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR / M.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR),2) end as ACTL_CPH_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,sum(L.ACTL_WAGE_MPR) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,sum (L.ACTL_HRS_MPR) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR,sum(x.ACTL_HRS_MPZ) as ACTL_HRS_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL (U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) M order by M.rgn_no

TCName.name: WagePercentageHistoryFirsthMonth
TCName.WagePercentageHistory: select x.zone_no, case when NVL(x.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPZ,0)=0 and NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPZ,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPZ,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPZ,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((x.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPZ / y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPZ)*100,2) end as ACTL_WGE_PRCNT_MPR from (select x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPZ from (select V.zone_no,V.ar_no,ROUND(sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no, zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no order by x.zone_no) x,(select K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPZ from (select J.zone_no,J.ar_no,ROUND(sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm, b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by k.zone_no order by zone_no) y where x.zone_no=y.zone_no order by x.zone_no
TCName.WagePercentageHistoryTotal: select actl_wge.rgn_no, case when NVL(actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR / actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR)*100,2) end as ACTL_WAGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,sum (L.ACTL_WAGE_MPR) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum (V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) actl_wge, (select L.rgn_no,sum(L.ACTL_SLS_MPR) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select K.rgn_no,K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR from (select J.rgn_no,J.zone_no, J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a. loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no order by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) actl_sls where actl_wge.rgn_no=actl_sls.rgn_no order by actl_wge.rgn_no

TCName.name: WagePercentageHistorySecondMonth
TCName.WagePercentageHistory: select x.zone_no, case when NVL(x.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPZ,0)=0 and NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPZ,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPZ,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPZ,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((x.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPZ / y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPZ)*100,2) end as ACTL_WGE_PRCNT_MPR from (select x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPZ from (select V.zone_no,V.ar_no,ROUND(sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no order by x.zone_no) x,(select K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPZ from (select J.zone_no,J.ar_no,ROUND(sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm, b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by k.zone_no order by zone_no) y where x.zone_no=y.zone_no order by x.zone_no
TCName.WagePercentageHistoryTotal: select actl_wge.rgn_no, case when NVL(actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR / actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR)*100,2) end as ACTL_WAGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,sum (L.ACTL_WAGE_MPR) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum (V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) actl_wge, (select L.rgn_no,sum(L.ACTL_SLS_MPR) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select K.rgn_no,K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR from (select J.rgn_no,J.zone_no, J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a. loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no order by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) actl_sls where actl_wge.rgn_no=actl_sls.rgn_no order by actl_wge.rgn_no

a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm TCName.WagePercentageHistoryTotal: select actl_wge.rgn_no, case when NVL(actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR / actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR)*100,2) end as ACTL_WAGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,sum (L.ACTL_WAGE_MPR) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum (V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) actl_wge, (select L.rgn_no,sum(L.ACTL_SLS_MPR) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select K.rgn_no,K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR from (select J.rgn_no,J.zone_no, J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a. loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no order by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) actl_sls where actl_wge.rgn_no=actl_sls.rgn_no order by actl_wge.rgn_no

TCName.name: ItemPriceHistoryFirsthMonth
TCName.ItemPriceHistory: select x.zone_no, case when NVL(x.ACTL_SLS_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(x.ACTL_ITM_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_ITM_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((x.ACTL_SLS_MPR / x.ACTL_ITM_MPR),2) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_MPR from (select K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR,ROUND (sum(K.ACTL_ITM_MPZ),0) as ACTL_ITM_MPR from (select J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ,sum(J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES, J.ACTL_ITEMS from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES,sum(S.ACTL_ITEMS) as ACTL_ITEMS from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES,sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEMS from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by k.zone_no order by zone_no) x
TCName.ItemPriceHistoryTotal: select y.rgn_no, case when NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR / y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR),2) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(ACTL_SLS_MPR),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,ROUND(sum(ACTL_ITM_MPR),0) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR from (select k.rgn_no,K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_ITM_MPZ), 0) as ACTL_ITM_MPR from (select j.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ,sum(J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no, loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES,J.ACTL_ITEMS from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES,sum(S.ACTL_ITEMS) as ACTL_ITEMS from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES,sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEMS from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by j.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by j.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by k.rgn_no,k.zone_no order by k.rgn_no,k.zone_no) x group by x.rgn_no order by x.rgn_no) y

TCName.name: ItemPriceHistorySecondMonth
TCName.ItemPriceHistory: select x.zone_no, case when NVL(x.ACTL_SLS_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(x.ACTL_ITM_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_ITM_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((x.ACTL_SLS_MPR / x.ACTL_ITM_MPR),2) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_MPR from (select K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR,ROUND (sum(K.ACTL_ITM_MPZ),0) as ACTL_ITM_MPR from (select J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ,sum(J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES, J.ACTL_ITEMS from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES,sum(S.ACTL_ITEMS) as ACTL_ITEMS from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES,sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEMS from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by k.zone_no order by zone_no) x
TCName.ItemPriceHistoryTotal: select y.rgn_no, case when NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR / y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR),2) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(ACTL_SLS_MPR),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,ROUND(sum(ACTL_ITM_MPR),0) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR from (select k.rgn_no,K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_ITM_MPZ), 0) as ACTL_ITM_MPR from (select j.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ,sum(J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no, loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES,J.ACTL_ITEMS from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES,sum(S.ACTL_ITEMS) as ACTL_ITEMS from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES,sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEMS from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by j.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by j.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by k.rgn_no,k.zone_no order by k.rgn_no,k.zone_no) x group by x.rgn_no order by x.rgn_no) y

TCName.name: ItemPriceHistoryThirdMonth
TCName.ItemPriceHistory: select x.zone_no, case when NVL(x.ACTL_SLS_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(x.ACTL_ITM_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_ITM_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((x.ACTL_SLS_MPR / x.ACTL_ITM_MPR),2) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_MPR from (select K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR,ROUND (sum(K.ACTL_ITM_MPZ),0) as ACTL_ITM_MPR from (select J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ,sum(J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES, J.ACTL_ITEMS from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES,sum(S.ACTL_ITEMS) as ACTL_ITEMS from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES,sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEMS from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by k.zone_no order by zone_no) x
TCName.ItemPriceHistoryTotal: select y.rgn_no, case when NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR / y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR),2) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(ACTL_SLS_MPR),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,ROUND(sum(ACTL_ITM_MPR),0) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR from (select k.rgn_no,K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_ITM_MPZ), 0) as ACTL_ITM_MPR from (select j.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ,sum(J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no, loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES,J.ACTL_ITEMS from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES,sum(S.ACTL_ITEMS) as ACTL_ITEMS from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES,sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEMS from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by j.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by j.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by k.rgn_no,k.zone_no order by k.rgn_no,k.zone_no) x group by x.rgn_no order by x.rgn_no) y

TCName.name: ItemPriceHistoryFourthMonth
TCName.ItemPriceHistory: select x.zone_no, case when NVL(x.ACTL_SLS_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(x.ACTL_ITM_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_ITM_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((x.ACTL_SLS_MPR / x.ACTL_ITM_MPR),2) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_MPR from (select K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR,ROUND (sum(K.ACTL_ITM_MPZ),0) as ACTL_ITM_MPR from (select J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ,sum(J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES, J.ACTL_ITEMS from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES,sum(S.ACTL_ITEMS) as ACTL_ITEMS from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES,sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEMS from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by k.zone_no order by zone_no) x
TCName.ItemPriceHistoryTotal: select y.rgn_no, case when NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((y.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR / y.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR),2) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(ACTL_SLS_MPR),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPR,ROUND(sum(ACTL_ITM_MPR),0) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPR from (select k.rgn_no,K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_ITM_MPZ), 0) as ACTL_ITM_MPR from (select j.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ,sum(J.ACTL_ITM_MPG) as ACTL_ITM_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no, loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES,J.ACTL_ITEMS from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES,sum(S.ACTL_ITEMS) as ACTL_ITEMS from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES,sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEMS from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by j.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by j.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by k.rgn_no,k.zone_no order by k.rgn_no,k.zone_no) x group by x.rgn_no order by x.rgn_no) y

TCName.name: BudgetSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetSales: select y.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(y.BDGT_SLS_MPZ),0),0) as BDGT_SLS_MPR from (select x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.BDGT_SLS_MPG) as BDGT_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MPG,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(BDGT_SALES) as BDGT_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.zone_no,x.ar_no ) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no
TCName.BudgetSalesTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.BDGT_SLS_MPR),0),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.BDGT_SLS_MPZ),0) as BDGT_SLS_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.BDGT_SLS_MPG) as BDGT_SLS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MPG,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(BDGT_SALES) as BDGT_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no, b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no, C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no, x.ar_no ) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no
TCName.ForecastSales: select y.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(y.FCST_SLS_MPZ),0),0) as FCST_SLS_MPR from (select x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.FCST_SLS_MPG) as FCST_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPG,0) as FCST_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(FCST_SALES) as FCST_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b. rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.zone_no,x.ar_no ) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no
TCName.ForecastSalesTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.FCST_SLS_MPR),0),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.FCST_SLS_MPZ),0) as FCST_SLS_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.FCST_SLS_MPG) as FCST_SLS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPG,0) as FCST_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(FCST_SALES) as FCST_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no, b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no, C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no, x.ar_no ) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: PlannedSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedSales: select y.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(y.PLN_SLS_MPZ),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_SLS_MPG) as PLN_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no, c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id= b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no, c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(gnrt_sls) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc= 'Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a. loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.zone_no, f.ar_no,f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no
TCName.PlannedSalesTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.PLN_SLS_MPR),0),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_SLS_MPZ),0) as PLN_SLS_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_SLS_MPG) as PLN_SLS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no, zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(gnrt_sls) as
