GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: GeneratedSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.GeneratedSales: select y.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(y.GEN_SLS_MPZ),0),0) as GEN_SLS_MPR from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,sum(GEN_SLS_MPG) as GEN_SLS_MPZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no, e.loc_nm,NVL(d.GEN_SALES_MPG,0) as GEN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,a.loc_no, ROUND(sum(a.gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES_MPG from WW_WLP.fcst a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.fcst_dte between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and c.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, a.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm) d on d.loc_nm=e.loc_nm) f group by f.zone_no,f.ar_no order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no
TCName.GeneratedSalesTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.GEN_SLS_MPR),0),0) as GEN_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.GEN_SLS_MPZ),0) as GEN_SLS_MPR from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,sum(GEN_SLS_MPG) as GEN_SLS_MPZ from (select e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,NVL(d.GEN_SALES_MPG,0) as GEN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES_MPG from WW_WLP.fcst a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.fcst_dte between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and c.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm) d on d.loc_nm=e.loc_nm order by e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no) f group by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: BudgetWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetWages: select y.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(y.BDGT_WGE_MPZ),0),0) as BDGT_WGE_MPR from (select x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.BDGT_WGE_MPG) as BDGT_WGE_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_WAGE_MPG,0) as BDGT_WGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(BDGT_WAGE) as BDGT_WAGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b. rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm ) x group by x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.zone_no,x.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no
TCName.BudgetWagesTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.BDGT_WGE_MPR),0),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.BDGT_WGE_MPZ),0) as BDGT_WGE_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.BDGT_WGE_MPG) as BDGT_WGE_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_WAGE_MPG,0) as BDGT_WGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(BDGT_WAGE) as BDGT_WAGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no
TCName.ForecastWages: select y.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(y.FCST_WGE_MPZ),0),0) as FCST_WGE_MPR from (select x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.FCST_WGE_MPG) as FCST_WGE_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f. ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_WAGE_MPG,0) as FCST_WGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(FCST_WAGE) as FCST_WAGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no, b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm ) x group by x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.zone_no,x.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no
TCName.ForecastWagesTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.FCST_WGE_MPR),0),0) as FCST_WGE_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.FCST_WGE_MPZ),0) as FCST_WGE_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.FCST_WGE_MPG) as FCST_WGE_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_WAGE_MPG,0) as FCST_WGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no, loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(FCST_WAGE) as FCST_WAGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d. perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: BaseCostWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.BaseCost: select y.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(y.BASE_COST_MPZ),0),0) as BASE_COST_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.BASE_COST_MPG) as BASE_COST_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as BASE_COST_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT, WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no
TCName.BaseCostTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.BASE_COST_MPR),0),0) as BASE_COST_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.BASE_COST_MPZ),0) as BASE_COST_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.BASE_COST_MPG) as BASE_COST_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as BASE_COST_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no, zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no, g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: PlannedWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedWages: select y.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(y.PLN_WAGE_MPZ),0),0) as PLN_WAGE_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPG) as PLN_WAGE_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum (d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g. zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no
TCName.PlannedWagesTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.PLN_WAGE_MPR),0),0) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_WAGE_MPZ),0) as PLN_WAGE_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPG) as PLN_WAGE_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no, zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no= c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: BudgetWagesPercentage_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetWagesPercentage: select bdgt_wge.zone_no, case when NVL(bdgt_wge.BDGT_WGE_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(bdgt_wge.BDGT_WGE_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((bdgt_wge.BDGT_WGE_MPR / bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_MPR)*100,2) end as BDGT_WGE_PRCNT_MPR from (select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.BDGT_WGE_MPZ),0) as BDGT_WGE_MPR from (select x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.BDGT_WGE_MPG) as BDGT_WGE_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_WAGE_MPG,0) as BDGT_WGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm, sum(BDGT_WAGE) as BDGT_WAGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm ) x group by x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.zone_no,x.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) bdgt_wge,(select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.BDGT_SLS_MPZ),0) as BDGT_SLS_MPR from (select x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.BDGT_SLS_MPG) as BDGT_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MPG,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no, zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(BDGT_SALES) as BDGT_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no, b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.zone_no,x.ar_no ) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) bdgt_sls where bdgt_wge.zone_no=bdgt_sls.zone_no order by bdgt_wge.zone_no
TCName.BudgetWagesPercentageTotal: select bdgt_wge.rgn_no, case when NVL(bdgt_wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(bdgt_wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((bdgt_wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_MPR / bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPR)*100,2) end as BDGT_WGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(L.BDGT_WGE_MPR),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.BDGT_WGE_MPZ),0) as BDGT_WGE_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.BDGT_WGE_MPG) as BDGT_WGE_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_WAGE_MPG,0) as BDGT_WGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(BDGT_WAGE) as BDGT_WAGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) bdgt_wge,(select L.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(L.BDGT_SLS_MPR),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.BDGT_SLS_MPZ),0) as BDGT_SLS_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.BDGT_SLS_MPG) as BDGT_SLS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MPG,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no, loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(BDGT_SALES) as BDGT_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no ) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) bdgt_sls where bdgt_wge.rgn_no=bdgt_sls.rgn_no order by bdgt_wge.rgn_no
TCName.ForecastWagesPercentage: select bdgt_wge.zone_no, case when NVL(bdgt_wge.FCST_WGE_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(bdgt_sls.FCST_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(bdgt_wge.FCST_WGE_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(bdgt_sls.FCST_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((bdgt_wge.FCST_WGE_MPR / bdgt_sls.FCST_SLS_MPR)*100,2) end as FCST_WGE_PRCNT_MPR from (select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.FCST_WGE_MPZ),0) as FCST_WGE_MPR from (select x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.FCST_WGE_MPG) as FCST_WGE_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_WAGE_MPG,0) as FCST_WGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(FCST_WAGE) as FCST_WAGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm ) x group by x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.zone_no,x.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) bdgt_wge,(select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.FCST_SLS_MPZ),0) as FCST_SLS_MPR from (select x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.FCST_SLS_MPG) as FCST_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPG,0) as FCST_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum (FCST_SALES) as FCST_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.zone_no,x.ar_no ) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) bdgt_sls where bdgt_wge.zone_no=bdgt_sls.zone_no order by bdgt_wge.zone_no
TCName.ForecastWagesPercentageTotal: select bdgt_wge.rgn_no, case when NVL(bdgt_wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(bdgt_sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(bdgt_wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(bdgt_sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((bdgt_wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_MPR / bdgt_sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPR)*100,2) end as FCST_WGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,ROUND(sum (L.FCST_WGE_MPR),0) as FCST_WGE_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.FCST_WGE_MPZ),0) as FCST_WGE_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum (x.FCST_WGE_MPG) as FCST_WGE_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_WAGE_MPG,0) as FCST_WGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no, loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(FCST_WAGE) as FCST_WAGE_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no, b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) bdgt_wge,(select L.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(L.FCST_SLS_MPR),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.FCST_SLS_MPZ),0) as FCST_SLS_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.FCST_SLS_MPG) as FCST_SLS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPG,0) as FCST_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(FCST_SALES) as FCST_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum (frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no ) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) bdgt_sls where bdgt_wge.rgn_no=bdgt_sls.rgn_no order by bdgt_wge.rgn_no

TCName.name: LYWagesPercentage_CurrentMonth
TCName.LYWagesPercentage: select actl_wge_ly.zone_no, case when NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPR / actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_MPR)*100,2) end as LY_WAGE_PRCNT_MPR from (select T.zone_no,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPR from (select distinct zone_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by zone_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('LYMnth')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.wk_id) C group by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no) U on T.zone_no=U.zone_no) actl_wge_ly, (select T.zone_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_LY_MPR from (select distinct zone_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by zone_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.zone_no,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.zone_no,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('LYMnth') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.zone_no order by s.zone_no) J) U on T.zone_no=U.zone_no order by T.zone_no) actl_sls_ly where actl_wge_ly.zone_no=actl_sls_ly.zone_no
TCName.LYWagesPercentageTotal: select actl_wge_ly.rgn_no, case when NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPR / actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPR)*100,2) end as LY_WAGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPR) as ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPR from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR from (select distinct rgn_no,zone_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by rgn_no,zone_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('LYMnth')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.wk_id) C group by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no) U on T.zone_no=U.zone_no order by T.zone_no) V group by V.rgn_no order by V.rgn_no) actl_wge_ly, (select J.rgn_no,SUM(J.ACTL_SLS_MPR) as ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPR from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR from (select distinct rgn_no,zone_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by rgn_no,zone_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.zone_no,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.zone_no,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('LYMnth') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.zone_no order by s.zone_no) J) U on T.zone_no=U.zone_no order by T.zone_no) J group by J.rgn_no order by rgn_no) actl_sls_ly where actl_wge_ly.rgn_no=actl_sls_ly.rgn_no order by actl_wge_ly.rgn_no

TCName.name: PlannedWagesPercentage_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedWagesPercentage: select pln_wge.zone_no, case when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WGE_MPR / pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPR)*100,2) end as PLN_WGE_PRCNT_MPR from (select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y. PLN_WAGE_MPZ),0) as PLN_WGE_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPG),0) as PLN_WAGE_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm, NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum (d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f. loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) pln_wge, (select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_SLS_MPZ),0) as PLN_SLS_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_SLS_MPG) as PLN_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no, f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no, c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(gnrt_sls) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no, c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f. zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) pln_sls where pln_wge.zone_no=pln_sls.zone_no order by pln_wge.zone_no
TCName.PlannedWagesPercentageTotal: select pln_wge.rgn_no, case when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_MPR / pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPR)*100,2) end as PLN_WGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,ROUND (sum(L.PLN_WAGE_MPR),0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_WAGE_MPZ),0) as PLN_WAGE_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no, g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPG),0) as PLN_WAGE_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no, zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no, c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) pln_wge, (select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.PLN_SLS_MPR),0),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_SLS_MPZ),0) as PLN_SLS_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_SLS_MPG) as PLN_SLS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no, zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(gnrt_sls) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) pln_sls where pln_wge.rgn_no=pln_sls.rgn_no order by pln_sls.rgn_no

TCName.name: SMSHours_CurrentMonth
TCName.SMSHours: select y.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND(((sum(y.SMS_HRS_MPZ)*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as SMS_HRS_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.SMS_HRS_MPG) as SMS_HRS_MPZ from (select x.zone_no,x.ar_no,x.loc_nm,NVL(y.SMS_HOURS_MPS,0) as SMS_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) x LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,(sum(C.FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT) + sum(C.VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT)) as SMS_HOURS_MPS from (select A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no, sum(fix_hrs) as FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT,Sum(vol_hrs) as VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,B.PERD_DESC, a.wk_id,d.dept_no,a.task_no,nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,NVL(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_lbr_std a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c, ww_wlp.task d where a.task_no=d.task_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and d.dept_no!=20 and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') A group by A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no order by A.loc_no,A.wk_id,A.dept_no) C group by C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by c.loc_no) y on x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm order by x.zone_no,x.ar_no,x.loc_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no
TCName.SMSHoursTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(SUM(ROUND(((ROUND(((L.SMS_HRS_MPR*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2)),0) as SMS_HRS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,sum(y.SMS_HRS_MPZ) as SMS_HRS_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.SMS_HRS_MPG) as SMS_HRS_MPZ from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,x.loc_nm,NVL(y.SMS_HOURS_MPS,0) as SMS_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) x LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,(sum(C.FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT) + sum(C.VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT)) as SMS_HOURS_MPS from (select A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no,sum(fix_hrs) as FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT,Sum(vol_hrs) as VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no, c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,B.PERD_DESC,a.wk_id,d.dept_no,a.task_no,nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,NVL(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_lbr_std a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c, ww_wlp.task d where a.task_no=d.task_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and d.dept_no!=20 and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') A group by A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no order by A.loc_no,A.wk_id,A.dept_no) C group by C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by c.loc_no) y on x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,x.loc_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g. ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: BaseHours_CurrentMonth
TCName.Basehours: select y.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(y.BASE_HRS_MPZ),0),0) as BASE_HRS_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.BASE_HRS_MPG) as BASE_HRS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as BASE_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS, WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no
TCName.BasehoursTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.BASE_HRS_MPR),0),0) as BASE_HRS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.BASE_HRS_MPZ),0) as BASE_HRS_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.BASE_HRS_MPG) as BASE_HRS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as BASE_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no, zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no, g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: PlannedHours_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedHours: select y.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(y.PLN_HRS_MPZ),0),0) as PLN_HRS_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG) as PLN_HRS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no, f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no
TCName.PlannedHoursTotal: select L.rgn_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(L.PLN_HRS_MPR),0),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_HRS_MPZ),0) as PLN_HRS_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG) as PLN_HRS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS, WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no, f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no

TCName.name: VarToBUDSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.VartoBUD: select pln_sls.zone_no,NVL((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPR - bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_MPR),0) as VAR_TO_BDGT_SLS_MPR from (select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_SLS_MPZ),0) as PLN_SLS_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_SLS_MPG) as PLN_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(gnrt_sls) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no, c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) pln_sls,(select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.BDGT_SLS_MPZ),0) as BDGT_SLS_MPR from (select x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.BDGT_SLS_MPG) as BDGT_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MPG,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no, loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(BDGT_SALES) as BDGT_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.zone_no, x.ar_no ) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) bdgt_sls where pln_sls.zone_no=bdgt_sls.zone_no order by pln_sls.zone_no
TCName.VartoBUDTotal: select pln_sls.rgn_no,NVL((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPR - bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPR),0) as VAR_TO_BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(L.PLN_SLS_MPR),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_SLS_MPZ),0) as PLN_SLS_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_SLS_MPG) as PLN_SLS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm, b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no, c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(gnrt_sls) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm, b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) pln_sls, (select L.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(L.BDGT_SLS_MPR),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.BDGT_SLS_MPZ),0) as BDGT_SLS_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.BDGT_SLS_MPG) as BDGT_SLS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MPG,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no, loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(BDGT_SALES) as BDGT_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no, x.ar_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no ) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) bdgt_sls where pln_sls.rgn_no=bdgt_sls.rgn_no order by pln_sls.rgn_no
TCName.VartoFCST: select pln_sls.zone_no,NVL((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPR - fcst_sls.FCST_SLS_MPR),0) as VAR_TO_FCST_SLS_MPR from (select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_SLS_MPZ),0) as PLN_SLS_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_SLS_MPG) as PLN_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(gnrt_sls) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no, f.ar_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) pln_sls,(select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.FCST_SLS_MPZ),0) as FCST_SLS_MPR from (select x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.FCST_SLS_MPG) as FCST_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPG,0) as FCST_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(FCST_SALES) as FCST_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.zone_no,x.ar_no ) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) fcst_sls where pln_sls.zone_no=fcst_sls.zone_no order by pln_sls.zone_no
TCName.VartoFCSTTotal: select pln_sls.rgn_no,NVL((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPR - fcst_sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPR),0) as VAR_TO_FCST_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(L.PLN_SLS_MPR),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_SLS_MPZ),0) as PLN_SLS_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_SLS_MPG) as PLN_SLS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm, b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no, c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(gnrt_sls) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm, b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) pln_sls, (select L.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(L.FCST_SLS_MPR),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.FCST_SLS_MPZ),0) as FCST_SLS_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.FCST_SLS_MPG) as FCST_SLS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPG,0) as FCST_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no, loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(FCST_SALES) as FCST_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no, x.ar_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no ) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) fcst_sls where pln_sls.rgn_no=fcst_sls.rgn_no order by pln_sls.rgn_no

TCName.name: LYPercentageSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.LYPercentageSales: select pln_sls_cy.zone_no, case when NVL(pln_sls_cy.PLN_SLS_CY_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_sls_cy.PLN_SLS_CY_MPR,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_sls_cy.PLN_SLS_CY_MPR / actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_MPR)-1)*100,2) end as LY_PRCNT_SLS_MPR from (select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum (y.PLN_SLS_MPZ),0) as PLN_SLS_CY_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_SLS_MPG) as PLN_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum (e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(gnrt_sls) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no, c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.zone_no,f.ar_no, f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) pln_sls_cy, (select K.zone_no,ROUND(sum(K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_LY_MPR from (select J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no, T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm,sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('LYMnth') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by k.zone_no order by zone_no) actl_sls_ly where pln_sls_cy.zone_no=actl_sls_ly.zone_no order by pln_sls_cy.zone_no

NVL(pln_sls_cy.PLN_SLS_CY_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_sls_cy.PLN_SLS_CY_TOT_MPR / actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPR)-1)*100,2) end as div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(gnrt_sls) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) pln_sls_cy,(select L.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(L.ACTL_SLS_MPR),0) as ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPR from (select K.rgn_no,K.zone_no,ROUND(sum (K.ACTL_SLS_MPZ),0) as ACTL_SLS_MPR from (select J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no,sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPG) as ACTL_SLS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm, NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm, sum(S.ACTL_SALES) as ACTL_SALES from (select a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('LYMnth') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.loc_no,s.loc_nm order by s.loc_no) J) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_no) J group by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no order by J.rgn_no,J.zone_no,J.ar_no) K group by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no order by K.rgn_no,k.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) actl_sls_ly where pln_sls_cy.rgn_no=actl_sls_ly.rgn_no order by pln_sls_cy.rgn_no

TCName.name: BudgetPercentageSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.BUDPercentageSales: select pln_sls.zone_no, case when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPR / bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_MPR)-1)*100,2) end as BDGT_PRCNT_SLS_MPR from (select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_SLS_MPZ),0) as PLN_SLS_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_SLS_MPG) as PLN_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no, rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(gnrt_sls) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no, f.ar_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) pln_sls,(select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.BDGT_SLS_MPZ),0) as BDGT_SLS_MPR from (select x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.BDGT_SLS_MPG) as BDGT_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MPG,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(BDGT_SALES) as BDGT_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.zone_no,x.ar_no ) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) bdgt_sls where pln_sls.zone_no=bdgt_sls.zone_no order by pln_sls.zone_no
TCName.BUDPercentageSalesTotal: select pln_sls.rgn_no, case when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPR / bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPR)-1)*100,2) end as BDGT_PRCNT_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,ROUND (sum(L.PLN_SLS_MPR),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_SLS_MPZ),0) as PLN_SLS_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no, sum(g.PLN_SLS_MPG) as PLN_SLS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,sum(gnrt_sls) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) pln_sls,(select L.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(L.BDGT_SLS_MPR),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.BDGT_SLS_MPZ),0) as BDGT_SLS_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.BDGT_SLS_MPG) as BDGT_SLS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MPG,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no, loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(BDGT_SALES) as BDGT_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no, C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no, x.ar_no ) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) bdgt_sls where pln_sls.rgn_no=bdgt_sls.rgn_no order by pln_sls.rgn_no
TCName.FCSTPercentageSales: select pln_sls.zone_no, case when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(fcst_sls.FCST_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(fcst_sls.FCST_SLS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPR / fcst_sls.FCST_SLS_MPR)-1)*100,2) end as FCST_PRCNT_SLS_MPR from (select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_SLS_MPZ),0) as PLN_SLS_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_SLS_MPG) as PLN_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_MPG from (select (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(a.mgr_wky_sls) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by
