a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no, c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm group by f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) pln_sls,(select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.FCST_SLS_MPZ),0) as FCST_SLS_MPR from (select x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.FCST_SLS_MPG) as FCST_SLS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPG,0) as FCST_SLS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,sum(FCST_SALES) as FCST_SALES_MPG from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by C.ar_no,C.loc_no) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no,x.ar_no order by x.zone_no,x.ar_no ) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) fcst_sls where pln_sls.zone_no=fcst_sls.zone_no order by pln_sls.zone_no

GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and b.perd_desc='Month' and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no, g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) pln_sls,(select L.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(L.FCST_SLS_MPR),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.FCST_SLS_MPZ),0) as FCST_SLS_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,sum(x.FCST_SLS_MPG) as TCName.name: LYPercentageWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.LYPercentageWages: select pln_wge_cy.zone_no, case when NVL(pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_MPR,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_MPR / actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPR)-1)*100,2) end as LY_PRCNT_WAGE_MPR from (select y.zone_no, ROUND(sum(y.PLN_WAGE_MPZ),0) as PLN_WAGE_CY_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPG),0) as PLN_WAGE_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm, NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no, c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) pln_wge_cy,(select x.zone_no,ROUND(sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ),0) as ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPR from (select V.zone_no, V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no, b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('LYMnth')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no order by x.zone_no) actl_wge_ly where pln_wge_cy.zone_no=actl_wge_ly.zone_no
TCName.LYPercentageWagesTotal: Select pln_wge_cy.rgn_no, case when NVL(pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_TOT_MPR / actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPR)-1)*100,2) end as g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPG),0) as PLN_WAGE_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no, rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) pln_wge_cy,(select L.rgn_no, ROUND(sum(L.ACTL_WAGE_MPR),0) as ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_WAGE_MPZ) as ACTL_WAGE_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no, sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPG) as ACTL_WAGE_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no, b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('LYMnth')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) actl_wge_ly where pln_wge_cy.rgn_no=actl_wge_ly.rgn_no order by pln_wge_cy.rgn_no

TCName.name: LYPercentageHours_CurrentMonth
TCName.LYHours: select pln_hrs_cy.zone_no, case when NVL(pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_MPR,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_MPR / actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_MPR)-1)*100,2) end as LY_PRCNT_HRS_MPR from (select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_HRS_MPZ),0) as PLN_HRS_CY_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG) as PLN_HRS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f left outer join (/*select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION*/ select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) */ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) pln_hrs_cy, (select x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_HRS_MPZ) as ACTL_HRS_LY_MPR from (select V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_MPZ from (select T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('LYMnth')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.zone_no order by x.zone_no) actl_hrs_ly where pln_hrs_cy.zone_no=actl_hrs_ly.zone_no order by pln_hrs_cy.zone_no
TCName.LYHoursTotal: select pln_hrs_cy.rgn_no, case when NVL(pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_TOT_MPR / actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_TOT_MPR)-1)*100,2) end as LY_PRCNT_HRS_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(L.PLN_HRS_MPR),0) as PLN_HRS_CY_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_HRS_MPZ),0) as PLN_HRS_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG) as PLN_HRS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (/*select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION */ select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d /*where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) */ group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) pln_hrs_cy, (select L.rgn_no,sum(L.ACTL_HRS_MPR) as ACTL_HRS_LY_TOT_MPR from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,sum(x.ACTL_HRS_MPZ) as ACTL_HRS_MPR from (select V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no,sum(V.ACTL_HRS_MPG) as ACTL_HRS_MPZ from (select T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no,T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('LYMnth')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm order by c.ar_no,c.loc_no) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.rgn_no,T.zone_no,T.ar_no) V group by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no order by V.rgn_no,V.zone_no,V.ar_no) x group by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) actl_hrs_ly where pln_hrs_cy.rgn_no=actl_hrs_ly.rgn_no order by pln_hrs_cy.rgn_no

TCName.name: PlannedOR_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedOR: select sms_hrs.zone_no, case when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_MPR / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPR)*100,1) end as PLN_OR_MPR from (select y.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND(((sum(y.SMS_HRS_MPZ)*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as SMS_HRS_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.SMS_HRS_MPG) as SMS_HRS_MPZ from (select x.zone_no,x.ar_no,x.loc_nm,NVL(y.SMS_HOURS_MPS,0) as SMS_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no) x LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,(sum(C.FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT) + sum(C.VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT)) as SMS_HOURS_MPS from (select A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no,sum(fix_hrs) as FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT,Sum(vol_hrs) as VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,B.PERD_DESC,a.wk_id,d.dept_no,a.task_no,nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,NVL(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_lbr_std a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c, ww_wlp.task d where a.task_no=d.task_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and d.dept_no!=20 and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') A group by A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no order by A.loc_no,A.wk_id,A.dept_no) C group by C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by c.loc_no) y on x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm order by x.zone_no,x.ar_no,x.loc_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) sms_hrs, (select y.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND(((sum(y.PLN_HRS_MPZ)*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as PLN_HRS_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG) as PLN_HRS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no, f.loc_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.zone_no=pln_hrs.zone_no
TCName.PlannedORTotal: select sms_hrs.rgn_no, case when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 ELSE ROUND((sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPR / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPR)*100,1) end as PLN_OR_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,NVL(sum(ROUND(((ROUND(((L.SMS_HRS_MPR*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2)),0) as SMS_HRS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,sum(y.SMS_HRS_MPZ) as SMS_HRS_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.SMS_HRS_MPG) as SMS_HRS_MPZ from (select x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,x.loc_nm,NVL(y.SMS_HOURS_MPS,0) as SMS_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) x LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,(sum(C.FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT) + sum(C.VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT)) as SMS_HOURS_MPS from (select A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no,sum(fix_hrs) as FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT,Sum(vol_hrs) as VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,B.PERD_DESC,a.wk_id,d.dept_no,a.task_no,nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,NVL(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_lbr_std a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c, ww_wlp.task d where a.task_no=d.task_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and d.dept_no!=20 and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region') A group by A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no order by A.loc_no,A.wk_id,A.dept_no) C group by C.loc_no,C.loc_nm order by c.loc_no) y on x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm order by x.rgn_no,x.zone_no,x.ar_no,x.loc_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) sms_hrs, (select L.rgn_no,NVL(sum(ROUND(((ROUND(((L.PLN_HRS_MPR*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2)),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_HRS_MPZ),0) as PLN_HRS_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG) as PLN_HRS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no, f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.rgn_no=pln_hrs.rgn_no order by sms_hrs.rgn_no

TCName.name: PlannedCPH_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedCPH: select pln_wge.zone_no, case when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_MPR / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPR),2) end as PLN_CPH_MPR from (select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_WAGE_MPZ),0) as PLN_WAGE_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPG),0) as PLN_WAGE_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no, rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no, c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) pln_wge,(select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_HRS_MPZ),0) as PLN_HRS_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG) as PLN_HRS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) pln_hrs where pln_wge.zone_no=pln_hrs.zone_no order by pln_wge.zone_no
TCName.PlannedCPHTotal: select pln_wge.rgn_no, case when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPR / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPR),2) end as PLN_CPH_TOT_MPR from (select L.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(L.PLN_WAGE_MPR),0) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_WAGE_MPZ),0) as PLN_WAGE_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPG),0) as PLN_WAGE_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm, b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no, f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) pln_wge,(select L.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(L.PLN_HRS_MPR),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_MPR from (select y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_HRS_MPZ),0) as PLN_HRS_MPR from (select g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG) as PLN_HRS_MPZ from (select f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no, rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)) as BASE_HOURS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.rgn_no,f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no order by y.rgn_no,y.zone_no) L group by L.rgn_no order by L.rgn_no) pln_hrs where pln_wge.rgn_no=pln_hrs.rgn_no order by pln_wge.rgn_no

TCName.name: GrowthLYCPH_CurrentMonth
TCName.GrowthLYCPH: select pln_cph_cy.zone_no, case when NVL(pln_cph_cy.PLN_CPH_CY_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(actl_cph_ly.ACTL_CPH_LY_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_cph_cy.PLN_CPH_CY_MPR,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(actl_cph_ly.ACTL_CPH_LY_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_cph_cy.PLN_CPH_CY_MPR / actl_cph_ly.ACTL_CPH_LY_MPR)-1)*100,2) end as GROWTH_LY_CPH_MPR from (select pln_wge.zone_no, case when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_MPR,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_MPR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_MPR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_MPR / c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no) UNION select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,(sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and c.rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_no,d.loc_nm order by d.loc_no)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_no) g group by g.zone_no,g.ar_no order by g.zone_no,g.ar_no) y group by y.zone_no order by y.zone_no) pln_wge,(select y.zone_no,ROUND(sum(y.PLN_HRS_MPZ),0) as PLN_HRS_MPR from (select g.zone_no,g.ar_no,sum(g.PLN_HRS_MPG) as PLN_HRS_MPZ from (select f.zone_no,f.ar_no,f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_HRS_MPG from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_no,loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no, ar_no,loc_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_no,d.loc_nm,sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) as PLN_HRS_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and
